item.title: Custom Domains Guide
item.description: So you want to point a custom domain at takahe.social? Great! Before you start, you need to understand a few things: Custom domains are limited and available by request only. Email contact@jointakahe.org to request one; we may or may not have capacity. Each custom domain is administrative and operational overhead for us. Once you make accounts (identities) on your custom domain, you will not be able to move them away from takahe.
